thread.title: UN approves Syria ceasefire, but who will listen?

title: UN approves Syria ceasefire, but who will listen?
text:
UN approves Syria ceasefire, but who will listen? 12:41pm EST - 01:29 
The U.N. Security Council approved on Saturday a 30-day truce across Syria to allow humanitarian aid to penetrate the worst-hit areas, but reports of persistent fighting continue to pour in along multiple fronts.   U.N. Security Council approved on Saturday a 30-day truce across Syria to allow humanitarian aid to penetrate the worst-hit areas, but reports of persistent fighting continue to pour in along multiple fronts.  //reut.rs/2CIyVZq
